哯字的基本解释

哯
xiàn
不作呕而吐，亦泛指呕吐：“幼儿哯乳不止。”

哯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàn］
［《廣韻》胡典切，上銑，匣。］
(1)吐。唾弃。
(2)吐。呕吐。

哯字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　哯； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页190第28
【唐韻】【集韻】?乎典切，音峴。【說文】不歐而吐也。【玉篇】不顧而吐也。　又【廣韻】小兒歐乳也。　又【集韻】形甸切，音現。義同。　或作咞。

哯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
哯字的起名意思

暂无。

哯
Basic explanation of words
哯
xiàn
Vomiting without vomiting, also generally refers to vomiting: "Children can't stop sucking their breasts."
哯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàn］
["Guang Yun" Hu Dian cut, milled, box. ]
(1) Spit. cast aside.
(2) Spit. Vomiting.
哯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　哯; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 190 28
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Almost Dianqie, Yinxian. [Speaking text] I vomit when I'm not European. [Jade articles] I vomit regardless.　[Guangyun] Pediatric European milk also.　[Jiyun] The shape is cut and the sound is present. The same meaning.　Or 咞.
哯

Name meaning

xiàn
干呕, 不作呕而吐。 也泛指呕吐 retch
